actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Referred jointly to the Subcommittee on Criminal Law.
Committee on Judiciary. Referred jointly to the Subcommittee on Juvenile Justice.
Committee on Judiciary requested executive comment from Justice Department.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the purpose of carrying out the National Violent Crime Program for fiscal year 1986, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Violent Crime Program Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1986

summary.text: National Violent Crime Program Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1986 - Establishes the National Violent Crime Program for the detection, investigation, apprehension, prosecution, and incarceration of individuals involved in violent crime activity and drug trafficking. Authorizes appropriations for construction and remodeling of correctional facilities, the Office of Justice Assistance, and other prevention and law enforcement activities.

titles.title: National Violent Crime Program Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1986
A bill to authorize appropriations for the purpose of carrying out the National Violent Crime Program for fiscal year 1986, and for other purposes.
